safetyTips: We offer a "no contact" delivery or pick up to Ashford and surrounding area.
name: THE AMBRETTE KITCHEN
address: Ellingham Industrial Centre, 85 Ellingham Way, Ashford TN23 6JZ
description: Exotic Modern Indian Home Delivery and collection service in Ashford. Sister to the award winning Ambrette Restaurants in Canterbury and Margate.  Order via Phone, the Ambrette App, Deliveroo, Ubereats, Just Eat, Hungrrr.
